title: WTB:  T206 Davis with different backs
author: Bridwell

posts.post_title: WTB:  T206 Davis with different backs
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the T206 Davis (A's) card with the following backs:

Carolina Brights
Cycle
Sweet Caporal 460
Lenox

If anyone has any of these, let me know.  Will make a fair offer.

Thanks

This Davis T206 is a 350/460 subject; therefore, it was not printed with a Carolina Brights back.

With respect to the Sweet Cap 460 backs, it will not be found with a SC 460 Factory 30 back.
It can be found with the following......

Sweet Cap 460 Factory 25
Sweet Cap 460 Factory 42
Sweet Cap 460 Factory 42 overprint


Best regards and happy hunting,


TED Z

Thanks, Ted.  I'm now looking for the Davis (A's) card with only these backs:

Lenox
Cycle
Sweet Caporal 460 Fact 42
Sweet Caporal 460 Fact 42 overprint

If anyone owns any of these, please send me a PM.

Thanks for your help!

I still need these 4 backs of the Davis card:

Cycle 460
Lenox
Sweet Cap 350-460 Fact 42
Sweet Cap 350-460 Fact 42 overprint

Will pay a good price!  If you own any of these, even if you aren't selling, I'd like to confirm that they exist.  Thanks.
Ron,  The Lenox exists.  I saw one on eBay a few years back.  Scot
